attributes.action: Ban the press from releasing all and any details, from all and any sources,of personnel killed in action before receiving confirmation that NOK(next of kin) have been informed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition may seem the same as others running at the moment, however there is one main difference.We want the press stopped from issuing ANY information from ANY source!
The aim of this petition is to stop the press, in all it's forms, reporting on the death of personnel killed in action before receiving confirmation that NOK of the person involved have been informed.This proposal is to cover all sources of information given to the press.This includes information from sources outwith the MoD official source e.g. Mobile phone footage/messages, emails, telephone calls.This may be difficult to enforce on foreign press but a start should be made by inhibiting the UK press from releasing details before confirmation that the NOK have been informed

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
